content.rendered:
Key members from Diehl Metering, including Maya Ayoub, Senior Regional Sales and Business Development Manager, Ibrahim Gharbi, Technical Manager, and Daison Thomas, Technical Manager, recently conducted an extensive product training session at the TTE Corporate office. The training covered in-depth insights into Diehl’s Ultrasonic meter technology, various communication modes, Advanced Metering Infrastructure (AMI), Submetering for water, BTU meters, as well as their applications.

TTE Products & Solutions’ brand partner, Diehl Metering, is known for pioneering advanced metering solutions aimed at enhancing the intelligence of water and energy metering systems.
